body: Is there an ETA on the Winter Update? I know that there is still 2 months left of winter but I am just wondering.
body_tagged: Is there an ETA on the Winter Update? I know that there is still 2 months left of winter but I am just wondering.
title: Winter Update Question

replies.body: There hasn't been an update yet from IvyCode, but here are some sneakpeaks: https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.774181629330091.1073741831.640224412725814&type=1
